specs.title: Admin should have full read access to all entities
Admin should have full write access
Admin should have delete access
Manager should have read access to clients
Manager should have write access to projects
Manager should NOT have access to employee salaries (if implemented)
Employee should have read access to projects
Employee should NOT have write access to clients
Employee should NOT have delete access
Employee should have write access to tasks
Client should have read access to projects
Client should have read access to tasks
Client should NOT have write access to projects
Client should NOT have access to employees
Client should NOT have access to suppliers
should deny access without token
should deny access with invalid token
should deny access with expired token
should create a new client
should retrieve all clients
should retrieve client by ID
should update client
should create a new employee
should retrieve all employees
should retrieve employee by ID
should update employee
should create a new supplier
should retrieve all suppliers
should create a new professional
should retrieve all professionals
should create a new project
should retrieve all projects
should retrieve project by ID
should create a new task
should retrieve all tasks
should retrieve task by ID
should update task status
should delete task
should delete project
should delete professional
should delete supplier
should delete employee
should delete client
should register a new user successfully
should fail to register with duplicate email
should login with valid credentials
should fail to login with invalid credentials
should get user profile with valid token
should fail to access profile without token
should fail to access profile with invalid token
should update user profile
should validate password requirements
should accept Bearer token in Authorization header
should reject token without Bearer prefix
should reject malformed tokens
should verify all 6 CRM endpoints return data
should retrieve all clients with paginated response
should retrieve single client by ID
should retrieve all employees with paginated response
should retrieve all suppliers with paginated response
should have company and address fields (not category/payment_terms)
should retrieve all professionals with paginated response
should retrieve all projects with paginated response
should retrieve all tasks with paginated response
should handle pagination parameters
should provide total count for pagination
should return 401 for requests without authentication
should return 404 for non-existent resource
should log client creation
should log client read operation
should log client update
should log client deletion
Admin should be able to access audit logs
Non-admin users should NOT access audit logs
logged entries should contain required metadata
audit logs should capture changes in JSONB format
should log failed operations with error messages
cleanup function should be available
should support querying by user
should support querying by entity type
should support querying by action
should support querying by date range
Step 1: Admin registers and sets up company
Step 2: Admin creates employee records
Step 3: Admin creates supplier for project resources
Step 4: Admin adds external professional consultant
Step 5: Manager registers and creates project
Step 6: Manager creates project tasks
Step 7: Employee registers and views assigned tasks
Step 8: Employee updates task status
Step 9: Manager reviews project progress
Step 10: Admin generates reports and reviews audit logs
Step 11: Manager marks project as completed
Step 12: Verify all entities were created successfully
